article_title: Israel to reopen key aid crossing - US.
sentence: It  has  been  closed  all  day,  with  Cogat  -  the  Israeli  body  that  coordinates  government  activities  in  the  occupied  territories  -  saying  it  was  due  to  "security  reasons",  after  Hamas  rocket  strikes  nearby  killed  four  Israeli  soldiers  yesterday.
